title: belgacom font
content:
hello all, anybody know what the belgacom logo type name is ? thx in advance to all.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111222215143im_/http:/typophile.com/files/belgacom_5383.jpg)
author: flyingfish

comments.content: This is probably custom, but mixing [Chalet 1960 & 1970](http://web.archive.org/web/20111222215143/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=4) will get you very close.

I did a few variations for Landor UK 3 or 4 years ago(?), and that's the one they chose. It's a logo and not a font, although [Houschka Rounded](http://web.archive.org/web/20111222215143/http:/www.type.co.uk/index.php?p=a_to_z_listing&let=*&id=25707), developed recently, has a fairly similar stylistic set.

Nick Cooke

I checked - it was August 2002.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111222215143im_/http:/typophile.com/files/belg_4678.jpg)

This is Houschka Rounded Medium, stylistic set 1.

Nick Cooke
